short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click 'Play Next' automatically on Udacity and Udemy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Udacity and Udemy courses have a 5 second delay between videos. This extension presses 'Play Next' automatically at the end of a video. This skips the 5 second delay.
